DotExpander v Changelog

● New in v1.0

  • The hotkey mechanism was changed internally. If your hotkey stopped working after this update, please set it again and it should work. Please email if it doesn't.

● New features

  • DotExpander now works properly on Slack, WhatsApp, and other such websites. If you notice a website that behaves weirdly, please block it in the settings for the while, and let me know through email, so I can work on a fix.
  • Now you can export snippets to and from a CSV file!

● Functional changes

  • The extension no longer pops up automatically on every update. Instead, it displays a "NEW" badge on the extension icon.

Please support free software! We really appreciate it! :-D

Leave a review! Donate money!
